name: articus/data-transfer
description: Library for merging source data to destination data only if destination data remains valid after that

suggest.doctrine/annotations: It is required for Articus\DataTransfer\MetadataProvider\Annotation (default metadata provider)
suggest.psr/simple-cache: It is required for included metadata providers: Articus\DataTransfer\MetadataProvider\Annotation and Articus\DataTransfer\MetadataProvider\PhpAttribute
suggest.laminas/laminas-stdlib: It is required  for included metadata providers: Articus\DataTransfer\MetadataProvider\Annotation and Articus\DataTransfer\MetadataProvider\PhpAttribute
